description: Untrusted search path vulnerability in Yokka NoEditor 1.33.1.1 and earlier, OuiEditor 1.6.1.1 and earlier, UnEditor 1.10.1.2 and earlier, DeuxEditor 1.7.1.2 and earlier, SQLEditorXP 3.14.1.2 and earlier, SQLEditorTE 1.9.1.3 and earlier, SQLEditor8 3.8.1.2 and earlier, and SQLEditorClassic 1.8.1.3 and earlier allows local users to gain privileges via a Trojan horse executable file in the current working directory.
